definitions.dating_raw: Attested from the early 16 century until the med 17 century.

definitions.definition: The act of abstaining or refraining (from).
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the early 17 century.

definitions.definition: The act of declining to vote on a particular issue.
examples: There were five abstentions in the vote.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the late 19 century.

definitions.definition: Non-participation in the political world ; as a country avoiding international affairs .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) The act of restraining oneself. [Attested from the early 16 century until the med 17 century.]
secondary_definitions: The act of abstaining or refraining (from). [First attested in the early 17 century.]
The act of declining to vote on a particular issue. [First attested in the late 19 century.]
Non-participation in the political world ; as a country avoiding international affairs .
